No evidence metastasis : bilateral mammography , thorax xray , compute tomography ( CT ) scan abdominal echography bone scintigraphy . Adequate hepatic function : total bilirubin < = 1x upper normal limit ( UNL ) ; SGOT SGPT < = 2.5xUNL ; alkaline phosphatase < = 2.5xUNL . Adequate renal function : creatinine < = 1xUNL ; creatinine clearance > = 60 ml/min . Patients able comply study treatment followup . Negative pregnancy test previous 14 day .
